DocAttribute.Name: RecurrencePattern
DocAttribute.Documentation: Recurrence pattern that defines a time period, which, if given, is valid within the time period defined by _IfcWorkTime.Start_ and _IfcWorkTime.Finish_.

DocAttribute.Name: StartDate
DocAttribute.Documentation: Start date of the work time (0:00), that might be further restricted by a recurrence pattern.

DocAttribute.Name: FinishDate
DocAttribute.Documentation: End date of the work time (24:00), that might be further restricted by a recurrence pattern.
